name: WKInterfaceInlineMovie
desc: An interface element that displays a video's poster image and supports inline playing of the video.

items.name: func setAutoplays(Bool)
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value indicating whether the movie automatically begins playing as soon as the scene is presented.

items.name: func setLoops(Bool)
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value indicating whether the movie plays in a continuous loop.

items.name: func setMovieURL(URL)
items.desc: Sets the URL of the movie to play.

items.name: func setPosterImage(WKImage?)
items.desc: Sets the poster image to display for the movie.

items.name: func setVideoGravity(WKVideoGravity)
items.desc: Sets the resizing behavior for the movie content.

items.name: func playFromBeginning()
items.desc: Plays the movie from the beginning.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an inline movie object for use in SwiftUI.
